testcase.classname: As an administrator, I should be able to delete a loan plan record in the system through API connection.
testcase.name: The deletion of the desired loan plan record via API should be confirmed by sending
testcase.system-out: Given The API user sets "api/categories/details/25" path parameters.........passed Then The API user records the response returned from the api categories details endpoint and verifies that the status code is '400'.passed
